summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3276, for the improvement of North 71st Street and North 71st Street produced, from a connection to the existing sewer at Fremont Avenue to Greenwood Avenue; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40668, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
